name: Thunderstrike - Cloud Caller
text: If you control a Level 7 or higher "Thunderstrike" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this face-up card on the field; draw 1 card, and if you do, you can banish 1 Thunder type monster from your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Thunderstrike - Cloud Caller" once per turn.
